about_the_game:
Diehexegy is a hex grid turn-based 4x game with a unique twist: your armies are composed of dice. It has multiple victory conditions and straightforward gameplay.

EXPLORE and EXPAND

Explore, expand and reap the benefits for your empire.

EXPLOIT

Maximise your territory output. Just don't let your opponent profit from your hard work!

EXTERMINATE

Your dice are your armies. Experienced dice roll higher, low health dice roll lower.

WIN
Conquest is not the only way to win. Hold key sites, or be the king of the hill and take joy in the weeping of your enemies!

Features

  • Multiple win conditions
  • Armies of dice
